name: Gate Crash
description:
Gate Crash is a bullet hell/puzzle game, where you attempt to keep the system alive by collecting logic gates and completing damaged logic circuits while avoiding enemies!

Completed circuits must be logically correct to pass the level! Going through the instructions is highly recommended.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Left click to shoot.

Collide with logic gates to pick them up, collide with sockets to place them.
